title: Ticket #3153: file transfer plugins only work when should_transfer_files = yes
description:
cmd = /bin/cat
args = input
transfer_input_files = data://HelloWorld/input
#should_transfer_files = yes

If Condor's file transfer mechanism is not used (either should_transfer_files = no or if_needed and filesystem_domains match), the file transfer plugins are not invoked.

This is surprising because the plugins allow for transfer of files w/o using condor's built in mechanism. Ideally, the plugin invocation would not be linked to condor's internal transfer mechanism.
